content: Hello! I can fix your leaking sink today. What time works for you?
Hi! Can you come around 2 PM today?
Perfect! I'll be there at 2 PM. Please send me your exact address.
Hi! I'm available this Saturday for the cleaning. Is that okay?
Saturday works great! What time can you start?
I can start at 8 AM. Should take about 6 hours for deep cleaning.
Hello! I'd like to see the bookshelf design. Do you have any photos of previous work?
Yes! I'll send you my portfolio. What type of wood do you prefer?
Hi! I'll send you 3 logo concepts by tomorrow. Do you have any color preferences?
I prefer warm colors - red orange or yellow. Restaurant name is Spice Garden.
Hello! When would you like to start the tuition classes?
Can we start next week? Monday Wednesday Friday evenings?
